messages.message: Working on a POV that extracts handwriting using MARX OCR.  Some of the forms have handwriting that goes upward as the writing goes to the right.  This is leading to some handwriting not aligning with the sentence as the line below gets pulled into the line above as the lower line meets where the upper line is expected.  Wondering if there is anything to configure to help this?
@Dale DeLoy Unfortunately we do not have one right now!  If it's a very common problem then we can explore some options!
As always - appreciate your prompt response
